doc:
David Opatoshu https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Opatoshu 0 David Opatoshu (born David Opatovsky, January 30, 1918 – April 30, 1996) was an American film, stage and television actor. He was born in New York City, where he was reared and educated. His father was the Yiddish writer Joseph Opatoshu. David_Opatoshu ( born David_Opatovsky , January_30_,_1918 – April_30_,_1996 ) was an_American_film_,_stage_and_television_actor . He was_born in New_York_City , where he was_reared and educated . His_father was the_Yiddish_writer_Joseph_Opatoshu .
